title: Junior Daredevil Kit
desc: This kit contains printed Coroplast sheets to make three different gliders and a balsa glider kit along with a paper plane activity. This is a combo kit for the Aeromodelling Activity. It can be used for initial workshops to create awareness of Aeromodelling.
include: Paper Plane Kit, Coroplast Glider Kit (3 Types), Balsa wood Glider Kit
